### strongerOrdering() {#aa0dfee5215507fd57aef686907c1ff26}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static AtomicOrdering strongerOrdering (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7">AtomicOrdering</a> X, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7">AtomicOrdering</a> Y)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Return the stronger of the two ordering.

If the two orderings are acquire and release, then return AcquireRelease.
